              ["A "],
              ["while", [["c"]]],
              [
                " loop is used to execute a piece of code while a condition is true. The "
              ],
              ["while", [["c"]]],
              [
                " loop is to be used when a block of code is to be executed a variable number of times. For example the code shown gets the user input, as long as the user inserts numbers which are not "
              ],
              ["0", [["c"]]],
              [". If the user inserts "],
              ["0", [["c"]]],
              [
                ", the while condition is not true anymore so execution will exit the loop and continue on to any subsequent code:"
              ]
